item.description:
Join us as we support our friend Dorothy Torrey. We are putting a group together to go see this inspirational film. We plan on car pooling ~ please call Rain for details. 508-866-9228

"This film documents the transformation of Frank Ferrante's life. Frank is 54 years old, obese, depressed and addicted. He stumbles into a local raw, organic and vegan restaurant in San Francisco, Caf√© Gratitude.For the next 42 days, Frank will eat only raw food, practice gratitude, visit local holistic practitioners, and get a weekly colonic.Frank gets a new body, a clearer mind, and most importantly, a soaring spirit. May I Be Frank documents the essence of the human condition and what it truly means to fall in love again."

Frank Ferrante and the Director will be joining us after the movie for questions an answers !!


Wednesday July 14th at 6:30 PM
The Science Building, Lecture Hall A at
Cape Cod Community College, 2240 Iyannough Rd, West Barnstable MA

Cost: $15.00
item.name: "May I Be Frank" ~ Join us for a movie about sex, drugs, and transformation
